ygData.subject: RE: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I bought my combine for 30pp.. Someone wants 75pp for the dagger.. I m sorry I can t recall the exact specs on the Dirk at the moment, but I don t believe
ygData.messageBody:
> Yes, but this particular dagger is better than a
> combine longsword. Same damage, better speed, and
> buffs as well. probably less weight, too.
>
> Quite a bargain

I bought my combine for 30pp.. Someone wants 75pp for the dagger.. I'm sorry
I can't recall the exact specs on the Dirk at the moment, but I don't
believe they're worth 45pp (or even 20+pp if you had bought the CLS from a
gypsy for 50pp). But then again, that's just my opinion. I don't want to
start an off topic thread on weapons and such. =)
